item.description:
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ THIS MEETUP IS ON!! ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~


Our April Meetup will be at the Creature Comforts Doggie Daycare in Salem, Massachusetts. Please read all the details of this event below and be sure you understand them. If you have any questions, please contact me.

We wll have to sign a waiver relinquishing the owner of ALL responsibility in case of any type of accident (e.g., dog bites, people falling, etc.).

IMPORTANT: We will have to pay $10 per family (regardless of number of people or dogs) in ADVANCE. The fee will be refundable only IF you cancel by 5:00 pm the Thursday before. In other words, you MUST notify me by Thursday, April 3rd if you cannot make it. If you don't notify me by that time, you will NOT get a refund.

If by Thursday evening, I do not have 10 people signed up and paid, the event will be cancelled.

PLEASE CONTACT ME as soon as possible if you have any questions at all about the details of this Meetup.

Thanks,
-laura

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel April Meeting
